content: an chunkier/bulkier alternative to the original restistance hat this is in no way supposed to take away from the original please consider donating to support those affected by ice this is the link to donate to the cause donate to those impacted by ice 1 donate to immigrant law center of minnesota 2 this pattern is worked with a chunky yarn with larger needles use whatever size needles to achieve the general gauge i do tend to knit tighter so you may need to size down your needles accordingly the child-sized hat has not been checked for fit but is a general guess so please let me know if it needs to be adjusted enjoy 1 https //payhip com/b/fxkoa 2 https //www ilcm org/ways-to-give/
